data.feedback: Plan comprehensively covers all 9 user requirements with proper file organization and dependency tracking. Existing Flutter core files correctly identified. One critical execution order bug needs fixing before implementation.

issues.issue: epic-realtime-client has executionOrder: 2 but depends on epics with executionOrder: 3
forgot_password_screen.dart has no backend endpoint to call
issues.fix: Document as stub UI or add backend password-reset epic first

issues.issue: Duplicate dependencies in epic-platform-config and epic-dashboard

issues.fix: Remove - no documentation files per rules

suggestions: After fixing execution order, plan is ready for implementation
Consider adding api_endpoints.dart to filesToModify in epic-dashboard, epic-sharing-ui, epic-goals-ui (currently only in epic-auth-ui)
Ensure minSdkVersion in build.gradle.kts is set to 21+ for health package compatibility
